author: William Reichenstein
title: How Retirees Can Reduce Their Marginal Tax Rates
text: William Reichenstein is Powers Professor at Baylor University and head of research at socialsecuritysolutions.com. Many retirees pay a higher marginal tax rate on their income in retirement than they do before retirementâ€“even if their tax bracket falls in retirement years. Due to the taxation of Social Security benefits, many low- and middle-income retirees will pay Americans Should Be More Financially Literate. But What Does That Mean?
